task.summary: Added logic to create new users and login an existing user
Added lib that will allow youtube videos to be responsive
Added tabs for all the screens

Added two services - 1) to create new users in the Firebase database with their userid and name. 2) to load topics of interest for new users. Also pushed a new lib (underscore.min.js) to allow for better manipulation of the objects/arrays fetched from the Firebase database
Added logic that will store the users topics of interest in the Firebase database
Setup project to be deploy using the ionic deploy service; added logic to display the user's topics of interest in their profile
